languageModelTools.name: LMT4SwanLab-SwanLabListWorkspaces
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get the list of all workspaces (organizations) of current SwanLab users

tabGroup.description: The index of the tab group to check. This is optional- if not specified, the active tab group will be checked.

languageModelTools.name: LMT4SwanLab-SwanLabListProjects
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get the list of all projects under the specified workspace of SwanLab

tabGroup.description: The index of the tab group to check. This is optional- if not specified, the active tab group will be checked.
The index of the tab group to check. This is optional- if not specified, the active tab group will be checked.

languageModelTools.name: LMT4SwanLab-SwanLabListExperiments
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Obtain the list of all experiments under the specified SwanLab project

tabGroup.description: The index of the tab group to check. This is optional- if not specified, the active tab group will be checked.

languageModelTools.name: LMT4SwanLab-SwanLabGetExperiment
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Obtain detailed information about a SwanLab experiment (experiment name, configuration, environment, etc.)

tabGroup.description: The index of the tab group to check. This is optional- if not specified, the active tab group will be checked.

languageModelTools.name: LMT4SwanLab-SwanLabGetSummary
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Obtain the Summary information of a SwanLab experiment, including the final values and maximum and minimum values of the experiment tracking metrics

tabGroup.description: The index of the tab group to check. This is optional- if not specified, the active tab group will be checked.

languageModelTools.name: LMT4SwanLab-SwanLabGetMetrics
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Obtain the value of a SwanLab experimental metric

tabGroup.description: The index of the tab group to check. This is optional- if not specified, the active tab group will be checked.
The index of the tab group to check. This is optional- if not specified, the active tab group will be checked.
